definitions.definition: the moral or legal right or ability to control:
examples: The United Nations has used/exerted/exercised its authority to restore peace in the area.

definitions.definition: a group of people with official responsibility for a particular area of activity:
the group of people with official legal power to make decisions or make people obey the laws in a particular area, such as the police or a local government department:
examples: I'm going to report these potholes to the authorities.
